features: Anti-theft Design : The anti-theft doorbell corner mount for most video doorbell, ideal for condo, apartment ,office room. No more worry about your doorbell was stolen.
Compatible Doorbells:compatible with Video Doorbell , Please check the left picture No.2 for Compatible model No. (Doorbell is Not Included )
Adjustable Angle Scale: The video doorbell mount has angle scale. allows adjusting the angle to left or right from 0 to 140 degree It give you a better view angle
Easy to Install : The package include the Installation and screwdiver We put the video show in the gallery picture and then you can follow the Installation Instructions to finish the job in seconds.
Warranty: Your satisfactions is our first goal, If you have any questions with the order, Please feel free to contact us firstly and then we will give the quick solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars W O W 🏆
reviews.reviewText: When Ring first distributed there were no add on holder similar to this. I’m happy someone created an affordable design. Well done.The solar holder option sucks for the battery operated version due to after so many charges the wire stops working due to off on with requiring the to plug in. So to continue with the battery version stuck with recharge as needed.Due to sub zero temps here began using hardwired Lorex since Ring has temp restrictions and the battery issues during winter. But, no voice. Kept using Ring to talk to the dog out back in the broken Solar mount.While scrolling discovered this gem. Bought two hoping they work as great as described. In person they’re so much nicer than any other holder I’ve viewed.These are so price friendly during special deals and function for our needs I’m buying a third. One for the dog outback. Two for the front porch for the extra rings to keep an eye on the feral kitty condos and add a door bell for chat while maintaining the hard wire Lorex overhead surveying the property on all sides.Highly recommend this gadget. Unbelievably priced. Excellent functionality. Very easy to install. Remove to charge. Comes with everything one needs and an extra screw.Only need two to secure to the wall. The middle section isn’t necessary.I used an electric screw driver. If you do, go slow so as not to strip the Philips head screw.Hope this is helpful for anyone considering this purchase.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I must say I am thoroughly impressed with its design and functionality.😍🚀One of the standout features of this product is the adjustable angle, which allows me to position my video doorbell at the perfect viewing angle to ensure complete coverage of my front porch. The mounting bracket is also incredibly sturdy and well-made, ensuring that the doorbell stays securely in place.🚀Another excellent feature of this product is its anti-theft design. The corner mount ensures that the video doorbell cannot be easily tampered with or stolen, giving me a little peace of mind.🚀I was also pleased to find that the mount does not block the doorbell sensor, which is a common issue with other similar products. The doorbell cover holder is designed to perfectly fit the video doorbell, ensuring that the sensor remains unobstructed.💪🏼Overall, I highly recommend for anyone looking for a high-quality, sturdy, and reliable mount for their video doorbell. It provides excellent functionality, security, and ease of use, and is a great investment for anyone looking to enhance their home security.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, great value, works with the battery backed up Ring camera without modifications. The only criticism I have is the wire channel, if you're writing you your doorbell requires tweezers or hemostats to pull through, very small channel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good product even purchased one for my sister.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great mount but it's plastic
reviews.reviewText: Good design and easy to install, but it is plastic. I could do it if the wall and take the trimmer with ease. Was hoping for something a little tougher, but it is very functional. Looks a little bulky and it doesn't allow you to aim the ringer. I'm not able to see the packages on the porch because of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy install, secure and allowed me to tilt to angle that worked best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for any device running on battery, and forget it being all that secure
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I would rate this as security measure to be mediocre at best. I purchased the device only as a means to add more side to side pivot to my my Ring door bell camera, which it does provide. The fun ends there, because it is immensely difficult to install the camera into the already wall mounted base using the microscopic screw located on the bottom of the mount..and the base MUST be attached to the wall first. A camera thief would not even be slowed down, because they would simply break it off the wall. Servicing the Ring battery, on the other hand, requires a surgeon's hand. and plenty of patience.The Ring doorbell camera barely squeezes into the clamshell design along with the foam cushion provided, and getting it to seat properly and close it a feat requiring more than just 2 hands. It must then be held in place while the itty bitty screw is inserted into the bottom of the unit and turned. The material is flimsy, so there will be breakage if it's just a little off and you try to use a little force to seat it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fácil instalación buena relación calidad precio
reviews.reviewText: El material bueno, se ajusta bien en los ángulos
Fait ce pourquoi il est vendu à la perfection

reviews.reviewTitle: Great idea for safety and weather
reviews.reviewText: Great product keeps your ring doorbell safe and out of the worst of the weather

reviews.reviewTitle: No muy antirrobo pero protege de lluvia
reviews.reviewText: Basta abrir un tornillo para abrir la tapa y llevarse en aparato por completo. Estaba más protegida al estar atornillada a la base original, pero protege de la lluvia y sol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Selling points were the ability to angle your Ring doorbell, which it does quite well, also the security of your doorbell, made of plastic I believe this holder would be easier to remove from your door(frame) or wall than the Ring doorbell being fixed on without the holder.Also changing the doorbell angle is to easy and I had to add foam packing to tighten the fit.If you’re looking to make it harder for someone to remove/steal your doorbell, give this a miss.If you just need the ability to angle your doorbell this will do the job.
